title: E-commerce Order Processing
description: Automatically process new orders from Shopify, send confirmation emails, update inventory, and create shipping labels.
useCase: Perfect for online stores wanting to automate their order fulfillment process

title: Social Media Content Scheduler
description: Schedule and publish content across multiple social media platforms from a single Google Sheet.
useCase: Ideal for marketing teams and content creators managing multiple social accounts

title: Lead Nurturing Email Sequence
description: Automatically send personalized email sequences to new leads based on their behavior and interests.
useCase: Perfect for businesses wanting to nurture leads without manual email management

title: Invoice Data Extraction
description: Extract data from PDF invoices and automatically populate accounting spreadsheets or systems.
useCase: Great for accounting teams processing large volumes of invoices

title: Customer Support Ticket Routing
description: Automatically categorize and route support tickets to the right team members based on content and priority.
useCase: Essential for customer support teams handling high ticket volumes

title: Inventory Low Stock Alerts
description: Monitor inventory levels and automatically send alerts when stock runs low, with reorder suggestions.
useCase: Perfect for retailers and wholesalers managing inventory across multiple channels

title: Meeting Notes to CRM Sync
description: Automatically extract action items from meeting notes and sync them to your CRM system.
useCase: Ideal for sales teams wanting to keep CRM data updated after client meetings

title: Expense Report Automation
description: Automatically categorize expenses from receipts and generate monthly expense reports.
useCase: Perfect for freelancers and small businesses tracking expenses

title: Website Form to Multiple Destinations
description: Route website form submissions to different destinations based on form content and user selections.
useCase: Great for businesses with multiple departments handling different types of inquiries

title: Backup Automation Suite
description: Automatically backup important files and databases to multiple cloud storage providers on schedule.
useCase: Essential for businesses requiring reliable data backup and recovery solutions
